DataElement.preferredName: Tumor Results Domain Longest 2-Dimensional Lesion Measurement CDISC Variable Terminology Outcome
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Question which asks for the result of a lesion's longest bidimensional measurement.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Tumor Results Domain Longest 2-Dimensional Lesion Measurement
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A findings domain that represents quantitative measurements and/or qualitative assessments of the tumors identified in the TU domain._Having the greater length of two or the greatest length of several._The property of being measured and described using two orthogonal directions._A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part._Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A findings domain that represents quantitative measurements and/or qualitative assessments of the tumors identified in the TU domain.

Concepts.definition: A findings domain that represents quantitative measurements and/or qualitative assessments of the tumors identified in the TU domain.

Property.preferredDefinition: Having the greater length of two or the greatest length of several.:The property of being measured and described using two orthogonal directions.:A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part.:Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.

Concepts.definition: Having the greater length of two or the greatest length of several.
The property of being measured and described using two orthogonal directions.
A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part.
Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: any measurements, including linear dimensions, volume, and weight, of a patient's tumor.
